title: Atomic Wallet users lose $35 million in crypto assets in security breach: Report
description: Atomic Wallet has suffered losses totaling at least $35 million in cryptocurrency assets since June 2, according to an analysis conducted by renowned on-chain sleuth ZachXBT. Atomic Wallet boasts a user base of over 5 million individuals worldwide. The platform, which places the responsibility of asset storage on its users, is now facing intense scrutiny ... Read more
